titles.title: 329 She Only Touched The Hem (nice & easy)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
She only touch'd the hem
Of His garment
As to His side she stole
Amid the crowd
that gather'd around Him
And straight way
She was whole

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Oh touch the hem
Of His garment
And thou too shall be free
His saving pow'r
This very hour
Shall give new life to thee

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
She came in fear
And trembling before Him
She knew
Her Lord had come
She felt that from Him
Virtue had healed her
The mighty deed
Was done

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
He turned with daughter
Be of good comfort
Thy faith hath
Made thee whole
And peace that
Passeth all understanding
With gladness
Filled her soul
